distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for openvswitch fixes the following issues:
	  
- openvswitch was updated to 2.11.5 
- CVE-2020-27827: Fixed a memory leak when parsing lldp packets (bsc#1181345)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A flaw was found in multiple versions of OpenvSwitch. Specially crafted LLDP packets can cause memory to be lost when allocating data to handle specific optional TLVs, potentially causing a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
notes.title: CVE description
